segments.text: Next , please . Hello , may I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to send a registered airmail letter to France .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , it comes four dollars twenty cents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is your change . Please wait for your receipt of the registered mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also want to pack up my package . This is the notes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . En .. just a minute . Here it is . I need your signature on this note .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , one more thing , where can I mail this letter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Drop it in the mail box mark out of town . at that corner .
segments.speaker: S1
